title: Courses

form.title: Course Information
form.description: Enter the course information to include it in your plan

groupFormDes: Enter the group information to include it in the course
noActiveDays: Select a day to add times
courseFormDes: Enter the course information to include it in your schedule

validation.mustAddACourse: You must add a course first
validation.mustHaveActiveCourses: You must have at least one active course
validation.mustHaveActiveGroups: You must have at least one active group in some course

clearAll.title: Are you sure?
clearAll.description: This action cannot be undone. All courses will be removed from the list.

deleteItem.title: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
deleteItem.description: This action cannot be undone. "{{itemName}}" will be removed.

deleteCourse.title: Are you sure you want to delete this course?
deleteCourse.description: This action cannot be undone. The course "{{itemName}}" will be removed from the list.

deleteGroup.title: Are you sure you want to delete this group?
deleteGroup.description: This action cannot be undone. The group "{{itemName}}" will be removed from the course.
